{{Infobox Network Adapter |image1 = |image1_size = |caption = High Speed 2.4GHz (802.11g) Wireless USB Adapter |caption2 = |pp = |sp = http://support.dlink.com/ProductInfo.aspx?m=DWL-G122 |dl = |wikidevi = D-Link_DWL-G122_rev_C1 |wikipedia = |brand = D-Link |model = DWL-G122 |submodelappend = |submodel = |revision = C1 |subrevision = |model_part_num = |page_start_date = |page_start_origon = |sernum = |wlclass = G54 |series = DWL-G122 |if = USB |if_bus_version = 2.0 |ifconnector = Male A |formfactor = dongle |vendor_id = 07d1 |device_id = 3c03 |subvendor_id = |subdevice_id = |id_string = |windosid = |fcc_id = KA2WLG122C1 |icid = |boardid = 8WUSG07.2A1G |ecc_id = |oui = 00:17:9A,00:19:5B,00:1B:11 |chip1 = Ralink;RT2571W;RT2571WF; |chip2 = Ralink;RT2528;RT2528L; |chip3 = |chip4 = |antconn = |antenna = |wirelessstand = IEEE 802.11b/g |802.11g = 54 |802.11b = 11 |wififreq = 2.4 |receive_sens = |transmit_power = |linuxdriv = |windriv = |is_manuf = No |manuf = Alpha Networks |manuf_model = WUS-G07 |manuf_rev = |addchip = |flags = |802dot11_protocols = bg |accessible_UART = No |accessible_JTAG = |category = |availability = |eoldate = |fccapprovdate = 10/27/2005 |estreldate = |estprice = |upc = |ean = |dx_sku = |newegg = |asin = |asin_country = |asin2 = |asin_country2 = |country = |powledcolor = |connactled = |spdledcolor = |leddupcolor = |dimmin = |weight = }}{{TIDTOC|adapter}} ==Overview== "8WUSG07..2A1G" is silkscreened on the board in the FCC photos. {{seealso|D-Link DWL-G122 series}} {{SCollapse | '''dmesg''' (Ubuntu 14.04.3, kernel 3.19) |
[77.633321] usb 2-1.2: new high-speed USB device number 5 using ehci-pci
[77.865460] usb 2-1.2: New USB device found, idVendor=07d1, idProduct=3c03
[77.865471] usb 2-1.2: New USB device strings: Mfr=1, Product=2, SerialNumber=0
[77.865476] usb 2-1.2: Product: 802.11 bg WLAN
[77.865481] usb 2-1.2: Manufacturer: Ralink
[77.941168] usb 2-1.2: reset high-speed USB device number 5 using ehci-pci
[78.363891] ieee80211 phy2: rt2x00_set_chip: Info - Chipset detected - rt: 2573, rf: 0002, rev: 000a
[78.365284] ieee80211 phy2: Selected rate control algorithm 'minstrel_ht'
[78.429987] ieee80211 phy2: rt2x00lib_request_firmware: Info - Loading firmware file 'rt73.bin'
[78.430035] ieee80211 phy2: rt2x00lib_request_firmware: Info - Firmware detected - version: 1.7
}} {{SCollapse | '''lsusb -d 07d1:3c03 -vv''' (Ubuntu 14.04.3, kernel 3.19) |

	Coverage class: 0 (up to 0m)
	Supported Ciphers:
		* WEP40 (00-0f-ac:1)
		* WEP104 (00-0f-ac:5)
		* TKIP (00-0f-ac:2)

	Available Antennas: TX 0 RX 0
	Supported interface modes:
		 * IBSS
		 * managed

		 * AP/VLAN
		 * WDS

		 * mesh point

		 * AP/VLAN
		 * monitor
	valid interface combinations:
		 * #{ AP, mesh point } <= 4,
		   total <= 4, #channels <= 1
	Supported commands:
		 * new_interface
		 * set_interface
		 * new_key
		 * new_beacon
		 * new_station
		 * new_mpath
		 * set_mesh_params

		 * Unknown command (87)
		 * Unknown command (85)
		 * Unknown command (89)
		 * Unknown command (92)
		 * connect
		 * disconnect
	Supported TX frame types:
		 * IBSS: 0x00 0x10 0x20 0x30 0x40 0x50 0x60 0x70 0x80 0x90 0xa0 0xb0 0xc0 0xd0 0xe0 0xf0
		 * managed: 0x00 0x10 0x20 0x30 0x40 0x50 0x60 0x70 0x80 0x90 0xa0 0xb0 0xc0 0xd0 0xe0 0xf0
		 * AP: 0x00 0x10 0x20 0x30 0x40 0x50 0x60 0x70 0x80 0x90 0xa0 0xb0 0xc0 0xd0 0xe0 0xf0
		 * AP/VLAN: 0x00 0x10 0x20 0x30 0x40 0x50 0x60 0x70 0x80 0x90 0xa0 0xb0 0xc0 0xd0 0xe0 0xf0
		 * mesh point: 0x00 0x10 0x20 0x30 0x40 0x50 0x60 0x70 0x80 0x90 0xa0 0xb0 0xc0 0xd0 0xe0 0xf0
		 * P2P-client: 0x00 0x10 0x20 0x30 0x40 0x50 0x60 0x70 0x80 0x90 0xa0 0xb0 0xc0 0xd0 0xe0 0xf0
		 * P2P-GO: 0x00 0x10 0x20 0x30 0x40 0x50 0x60 0x70 0x80 0x90 0xa0 0xb0 0xc0 0xd0 0xe0 0xf0

		 * supported channel width

	Device supports TX status socket option.
